name: Milkrun 2
description:
------------------------Welcome to Milkrun 2!---------------------------

 This game starts off with an agent (the player, aka you) trying to steal the secret milk recipe from Milk.INC, the greatest milk company ever existed. The secret formula is guarded by dozens of highly trained guards, so you can either shoot your way in or try to avoid them. They have expert accuracy but they can be quite dumb.

-The game MAY be laggy for some people

-There are a lot of bugs pls tell me in the comments

-Level 5 is not finished yet
